Verses: 1 isravel Puththirarin Sabaiyellaam Seelovile Koodi, Ange Aasarippuk Koodaaraththai Niruththinaargal. Dhesam Avargal Vasamaayitru.
2 isravel Puththiraril Thangal Sudhandharaththai Innum Pangittukkollaadha Ezhu Koththirangal Irundhadhu.

3 aagaiyaal Yosuvaa Isravel Puththirarai Nokki: Ungal Pidhaakkalin Dhevanaagiyakarththar Ungalukkuk Koduththa Dhesaththai Sudhandhariththukkollappogiradharku, Neengal Endhamattum Asadhiyaayiruppeergal.

4 koththiraththirku Mummoondru Manusharaith Therindhukollungal; Avargal Ezhundhu Purappattu, Dhesaththile Sutriththirindhu Adhaith Thangal Sudhandharaththukkuth Thakkadhaaga Vivaramaai Ezhudhi, Ennidaththil Konduvarumpadi Avargalai Anuppuven.
5 adhai Ezhu Pangaagap Pagirakkadavargal; Yoodhaa Vamsaththaar Therkeyirukkira Thangal Ellaiyilum, Yoseppu Vamsaththaar Vadakkeyirukkira Thangal Ellaiyilum Nilaiththirukkattum.
6 neengal Dhesaththai Ezhu Pangaaga Vivariththu Ezhudhi, Inge Ennidaththil Konduvaarungal; Appozhudhu Ivvidaththile Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Ungalukkaagach Cheettuppoduven.

7 leviyarukku Ungal Naduve Pangillai; Karththarudaiya Aasaariyappattame Avargal Sudhandharam; Kaaththum Roobanum Manaaseyin Paadhikkoththiramum Yordhaanukku Appuraththile Kizhakke Karththarin Dhaasanaagiya Mose Thangalukkuk Koduththa Thangal Sudhandharaththai Adaindhu Theerndhadhu Endraan.

8 appozhudhu Andha Manushar Ezhundhu Purappattupponaargal; Dhesaththaikkuriththu Vivaram Ezhudhappogiravargalai Yosuvaa Nokki: Neengal Poi, Dhesaththile Sutriththirindhu, Adhin Vivaraththai Ezhudhi, Ennidaththil Thirumbivaarungal; Appozhudhu Inge Seelovile Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Ungalukkaagach Cheettuppoduven Endru Sonnaan.
9 andha Manushar Poi, Dhesam Engum Andhandhap Pattanangalinpadiye Ezhu Pangaaga Oru Pusthagaththil Ezhudhikkondu, Seelovile Irukkira Paalayaththile Yosuvaavinidaththil Vandhaargal.
10 appozhudhu Yosuvaa Avargalukkaaga Seelovile Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Seettuppottu, Ange Isravel Puththirarukku Dhesaththai Avargal Panguveedhappadi Pangittaan.

11 penyameen Puththirarukku Avargaludaiya Vamsangalinpadiye Avargaludaiya Koththiraththukku Seettu Vizhundhadhu; Avargal Panguveedhaththin Ellaiyaanadhu Yoodhaa Puththirarukkum Yoseppin Puththirarukkum Naduve Irundhadhu.
12 avargaludaiya Vada Ellai, Yordhaanilirundhu Vandhu, Erigovukku Vadapakkamaai Sendru, Appuram Merke Malaiyil Eri, Peththaaven Vanaandharaththil Poi Mudiyum.
13 angeyirundhu Andha Ellai, Peththelaagiya Loosukku Vandhu, Loosukkuth Thenpakkamaaip Poi, Adharodh Adhaarukkuth Thaazhvaana Peththaronukkuth Therkeyirukkira Malaiyaruge Irangum.

14 angeyirundhu Ellai Merku Moolaikkup Peththaronukku Edhire Therkaaga Irukkira Malaikkuth Thenpuramaaip Poith Thirumbi, Keeriyaadhpaagaal Ennappatta Yoodhaa Puththirarin Pattanamaagiya Keeriyaadhyeyaareem Aruge Poi Mudiyum; Idhu Merku Ellai.
15 then Ellai Keeriyaadhyeyaareemin Mudivilirukkiradhu; Angeyirundhu Ellai Merke Poi, Nepdhovaavin Neerootrirku Sendru,

16 angeyirundhu Raatchadharin Pallaththaakkil Vadakkeyirukkira Innomudaiya Kumaararin Pallaththaakkukku Edhiraana Malaiyadivaaraththirku Irangi, Appuram Therke Eboosiyarukkup Pakkamaana Innomin Pallaththaakkukkum, Angeyirundhu Enrokelukkum Irangivandhu,
17 vadakke Poi, Ensemesukkum, Angeyirundhu, Adhummeem Mettukku Edhiraana Keliloththirkum, Angeyirundhu Rooban Kumaaranaagiya Poganin Kallinidaththirkum Irangivandhu,
18 arapaavukku Edhiraana Vadapakkamaaippoi, Araapaavukku Irangum.
19 appuram Andha Ellai, Pedhoklaavukku Vadapakkamaaippoi, Yordhaanin Mugaththuvaaraththirkuth Therkaana Uppukkadalin Vadamunaiyile Mudindhupom; Idhu Then Ellai.
20 kizhakkuppuraththin Ellai Yordhaane; Idhu Penyameen Puththirarukku Avargaludaiya Vamsangalinpadi Sutrilum Irukkira Ellaigalukkaana Sudhandharam.
21 penyameen Puththirarin Koththiraththirku Avargaludaiya Vamsangalinpadi Irukkira Pattanangalaavana: Erigo, Pedhoklaa, Kesees Pallaththaakku,
22 pedharapaa, Semaraayeem, Peththel,
23 aaveem, Paaraa, Opraa,
24 keppaaramonaai, Opni, Kaapaa Ennum Pannirandu Pattanangalum Avaigalin Graamangalume.
25 kipiyon, Raamaa, Perodh,
26 mispe, Keppiraa, Modhsaa,
27 rekkem, Irpeyel, Thaaraalaa,
28 selaa, Elep, Erusalemaagiya Epoosi, Keepeyaadh, Keereyaadh Ennum Padhinaangu Pattanangalum Avaigalin Graamangalume; Penyameen Puththirarukku Avargal Vamsangalinpadi Irukkira Sudhandharam Idhuve.
